# Ignore log files
*.log

# Ignore the 'build' directory
/build/

/docs/output
/output/

# Exclude directories generated by CLion
.idea/
.cmake/
cmake-build-*/

# Exclude executables and object files
*.out
*.app
*.exe
*.o
*.so

# Exclude build artifacts
CMakeFiles/
CMakeScripts/
cmake_install.cmake
CMakeCache.txt
compile_commands.json

# Exclude user-specific files
CMakeUserPresets.json
CMakeUserPresets/
.idea/workspace.xml
.idea/misc.xml
.idea/modules.xml
.idea/vcs.xml
.idea/uiDesigner.xml
.idea/.name

# Exclude CLion project files
*.iml
.cproject
.project

# Exclude macOS .DS_Store files
.DS_Store

# Exclude user-specific settings
.vscode/
.settings/
*.sublime-project
*.sublime-workspace
sftp-config.json
.nfs

# Exclude user-specific editor/IDE files
*.swp
